-- AsyncProcessingServiceUpdate -- 2014/11/22 “ú—§ ‘¾˜Y UPDATE [AsyncProcessingServiceStatusManagementTable] SET

WHERE AND [RegistrationDateTime] = @P5AND [RegistrationDateTime] IS NULL AND [ExecutionStartDateTime] = @P6AND [ExecutionStartDateTime] IS NULL AND [NumberOfRetries] = @P7AND [NumberOfRetries] IS NULL AND [CompletionDateTime] = @P8AND [CompletionDateTime] IS NULL AND [ProgressRate] = @P9AND [ProgressRate] IS NULL AND [Status] = @P10AND [Status] IS NULL AND [Command] = @P11AND [Command] IS NULL
